Ability.Name: Simple extraction
Ability.Description: Choose one random card from the opponent's hand and exclude it from the game.

Ability.Name: Reset all
Ability.Description: Return all of the opponent's collected cards to the board.

Ability.Name: Explosive Growth
Ability.Description: Increase your collected cards by X cards (X is the turn number).

Ability.Name: Great Revolution
Ability.Description: From this point on, all card values will be reversed.
